episodeTitle: Knock Him Down!! Special Attack: Straw Hat Docking?
description: The Straw Hat Pirates attempt an embarrassing combination technique called Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor, but Robin refuses to participate. Meanwhile, Nami discovers that Thriller Bark's treasure vault is empty. The crew then coordinates individual attacks to topple the giant zombie Oars, while Brook searches for milk and salt in the kitchen.

events.title: Nami Discovers Empty Treasure Vault
events.description: Nami searches Thriller Bark's treasure vault expecting to find riches, but discovers it has been completely emptied. She encounters squirrels who nearly alert guards to her presence.
events.significance: Reveals that Thriller Bark's treasure has been stolen or moved, setting up a subplot about the missing wealth.

events.title: Oars Uses Gomu Gomu no Shirimochi
events.description: Oars demonstrates his own unique technique, Gomu Gomu no Shirimochi (Gum-Gum Butt Stomp), leaping into the air and attempting to crush the Straw Hats with his massive rear end.
events.significance: Shows Oars' creativity in combat, creating his own techniques beyond what Luffy's shadow provides him.

quotes.speaker: Oars
quotes.context: Oars uses his unique butt stomp technique

events.title: Straw Hats Attempt Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor
events.description: Franky initiates Tactics 15, a pre-planned combination technique where the crew physically combines into a giant mecha-like formation. Franky serves as the body, Chopper as the head, Usopp as the right arm, and Zoro and Sanji as the legs. Robin is supposed to be the left arm but refuses to participate.
events.significance: A comedic moment showcasing the crew's creativity and Robin's embarrassment, while also demonstrating their willingness to try unconventional tactics against overwhelming opponents.

quotes.text: Pirates Docking 6: Giant Robot Warrior Big Emperor!
quotes.speaker: Franky

events.title: Robin Refuses to Join Big Emperor
events.description: Nico Robin flatly refuses to participate in the Big Emperor docking maneuver, stating it is too embarrassing and that they should feel ashamed as humans. Her refusal leaves the formation incomplete.
events.significance: Establishes Robin's boundaries and dignified personality, providing both comedy and character insight. Disappoints both her crewmates and even Oars who was excited to fight the giant robot.

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin declines to be the left arm of Big Emperor

events.title: Coordinated Attack on Oars Begins
events.description: After the failed Big Emperor attempt, the Straw Hats shift strategy and begin executing a coordinated series of individual attacks designed to topple the giant zombie Oars by targeting his limbs and balance.
events.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical adaptability and ability to work together effectively even when their ridiculous plans fail.

events.title: Usopp Uses Tokuyo Abura Boshi
events.description: Usopp fires his Special Oil Star (Tokuyo Abura Boshi) at Oars' right foot, coating it with slippery oil to make him lose his footing and balance.
events.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's strategic thinking and support role in battles, setting up subsequent attacks by weakening the opponent's stance.

quotes.speaker: Usopp
quotes.context: Usopp fires his special oil star at Oars' foot

events.title: Zoro Uses Dai Gekken with Heavy Nunchaku
events.description: Sanji launches Zoro toward Oars using Armée de L'Air Power Shoot. Zoro pierces his two swords into Franky's Heavy Nunchaku (crafted from stone pillars) and delivers a devastating blow to Oars' left arm with his Dai Gekken technique.
events.significance: Shows the crew's creative teamwork and Zoro's adaptability in using unconventional weapons to fight giant opponents.

quotes.speaker: Zoro
quotes.context: Zoro attacks Oars with Franky's heavy nunchaku

events.title: Robin Uses Cien Fleur: Big Tree
events.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms on Oars' right arm, creating a mass of hands that resembles a giant tree. This technique restrains Oars' arm after Zoro's attack knocked it backward.
events.significance: Demonstrates Robin's Devil Fruit versatility in restraining even giant opponents through sheer numbers of limbs.

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin restrains Oars' arm with sprouted limbs

events.title: Franky and Chopper Use Super Heavy Gong
events.description: Franky and Chopper climb up to Oars' face and attack simultaneously with their combined Super Heavy Gong technique, striking Oars' jaw with tremendous force and causing him to lose balance.
events.significance: Shows the smaller crew members working together to deliver powerful coordinated attacks against a massive opponent.

events.title: Sanji Destroys Oars' Supporting Leg
events.description: With Oars off-balance from the coordinated attacks on his arms and face, Sanji delivers a powerful kick to Oars' remaining supporting left leg. This final blow causes the giant zombie to fall forward face-first to the ground.
events.significance: Demonstrates the effectiveness of the Straw Hats' teamwork and strategic coordination, successfully toppling a giant opponent through combined efforts.

events.title: Brook Searches Kitchen for Milk and Salt
events.description: Brook explores Thriller Bark's kitchen searching for milk to heal his cracked bones and salt to use against zombies. This subplot shows Brook's practical preparations during the ongoing battle.
events.significance: Sets up Brook's role in future zombie purifications and shows his self-sufficient nature in gathering resources.

events.title: Bartholomew Kuma Appears on the Thousand Sunny
events.description: A mysterious large figure carrying a Bible appears on the Thousand Sunny. He is revealed to be Bartholomew Kuma, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, who has arrived seeking Gecko Moria's location.
events.significance: Introduces a major threat to the arc and foreshadows dangerous confrontations to come. Kuma's arrival while the crew is fighting Oars creates additional tension and danger.

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin declines to participate in the Big Emperor docking

quotes.text: Pirates Docking 6: Giant Robot Warrior Big Emperor!
quotes.speaker: Franky

themes.description: Despite the failure of their ridiculous Big Emperor plan, the Straw Hats demonstrate excellent tactical coordination through individual attacks that work together to achieve their goal.
themes.symbolism: The shift from the failed combination attack to successful individual coordination represents the crew's adaptability and understanding of each other's strengths.
culturalReferences: Pirates Docking 6 is a parody of Super Sentai/Power Rangers giant robot combinations

themes.description: Robin's refusal to participate in the embarrassing Big Emperor technique highlights the balance between effective tactics and personal dignity.
themes.symbolism: Robin's stance represents maintaining one's principles even in desperate situations.

characterSpotlights.development: Robin establishes clear boundaries about what she will and won't do, showing her dignified personality while still contributing strategically to the battle.
keyActions: Refuses to participate in Big Emperor
Uses Cien Fleur: Big Tree to restrain Oars
Maintains her dignity while supporting the team

characterSpotlights.development: Franky attempts to lead the crew in a combination attack and provides equipment support when it fails.
keyActions: Provides Heavy Nunchaku for Zoro's attack
Attacks Oars with Chopper in Super Heavy Gong
quotes: Pirates Docking 6: Giant Robot Warrior Big Emperor!

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extends the Big Emperor sequence with additional comedic reactions and Oars' disappointment at not being able to fight the giant robot.

trivia.fact: Pirates Docking 6: Big Emperor is a parody of Super Sentai/Power Rangers mecha combinations, a popular trope in Japanese action series.
This episode adapts Chapter 472 of the One Piece manga.
The episode aired on Toonami on November 5, 2016, during the Thriller Bark arc marathon.
Robin's refusal to join Big Emperor has become a popular meme in the One Piece community, often cited as an example of her maintaining dignity.
